page.title: 04Leckford Leisure Activities
page.content: There are 27,000 people employed by John Lewis Partnership.Leisure activities are provided for them at Leckford.There is a holiday camp with twelve chalets.It has eight hundred people coming each year from May to the end of September.The Fishing Cottage and The Leckford Abbas,with 27 bedrooms,are small hotels and are open all year round. The activities are golf,which is a nine hole course,built in the 1930s.It is looked after by two people. There are three cricket teams in Leckford.The other activities are swimming,tennis and a bowling green. There are seven fulltime employees.The visitors come for fishing on the River Test and to spend time in the countryside.
